lead_paragraph: Danica Patrick, a winner on the IndyCar circuit who will still race there full time, will also run a part-time schedule in Nascar’s second-tier Nationwide Series.
snippet: Danica Patrick, a winner on the IndyCar circuit who will still race there full time, will also run a part-time schedule in Nascar’s second-tier Nationwide Series.

headline.main: Patrick to Confront Heat in the Car and Competition on Nascar Tracks
headline.seo: Patrick Will Confront Heat in the Car and Competition on Nascar Tracks
headline.print_headline: Patrick to Confront Heat in the Car and Competition on Nascar Tracks
